title: Champion Sentences for Download?

replies.body:
Some nice players have put all the champion VO lines up on the wiki: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ekko/Background

For example: ["Patience?  What's that?"](http://images.wikia.com/leagueoflegends/images/c/c1/Ekko.move17.ogg)

There isn't a download link, but you can right click and "save this link as" to download it.
I personally used to have a line for when I get texts.

There are different free apps availeable for your smartphone who can let you download almost every champion quote (skins included). Some can even let you set them as ringtones or notification allarms.
